# Overview

Welcome to the {{ graft_name }} graft. This is a lightweight Markdown starter for teams that just need prose and simple code fences.

## What to do next

- Replace this page with your own content.
- Add more `.qmd` or `.md` files under `docs/` and link them via the sidebar.
- Run `make render` (or `quarto render docs`) to build `_site/`.

Happy writing!
